item.title: NIX OS Overview
item.description: Make reproducible, declarative and reliable systems. Major Features: Reproducible Nix builds packages in isolation from each other. This ensures that they are reproducible and don’t have undeclared dependencies, so if a package works on one machine, it will also work on another. Declarative Nix makes it trivial to share development and build environments for your projects, regardless of what programming languages and tools youâ€™re using. Reliable Nix ensures that installing or upgrading one package cannot break other packages.
